post.body:
> A massively funny joke or situation, one that causes 6 million or more people to die laughing.

While I added this line to Wiktionary `Lolocaust` entry, I got the **censorship** (ban & log deletion).

https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?title=Lolocaust&action=history

comment.body: I do not mean Holocaust denial, just accurately describe how this word be used, but this is too "glass heart".
